column4: What's the command to read the current powersetting of the hard-drive? "sudo hdparm -B 254 /dev/sda" should turn off powersaving features. But how do I read the current value to confirm? I can't find the command in the man page, or rather, if it's there I can't figure it out.
128 is default if you are on battery power
